name: Hugo Mujica
bio: Hugo Mujica was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina. He studied Fine Arts, Philosophy, Philosophical Anthropology and Theology. His poetry has been published in Argentina, Spain, Italy, France, Mexico, United States, Chile, Slovenia and Bulgaria.  In 2005 Seix Barral published his "Complete Poetry 1983-2004", and in 2011 he published “Y siempre después el viento.” Both in his poetry and prose, he draws inspiration from his experiences which include living in Greenwich Village in the sixties as visual artist and seven years of silent monastic life of the Trappist Order.
